run_config.config_text:
# Auto-generated by; /nfs/team117/ts6/work/new-pipeline-dev/sanger-pipeline/branches/prerelease-7.0/bin/analyse_run v155 # At: 20080603-041506 # Goat executable: /software/solexa/src/SolexaPipeline/Goat/goat_pipeline.py # Runfolders: /staging/IL21/analysis/080530_IL21_0812
# This is a every-20th-tile run.
# This is the first read (only) of a paired run.
EXPT_DIR . EMAIL_SERVER mail.sanger.ac.uk EMAIL_DOMAIN sanger.ac.uk EMAIL_LIST ts6@sanger.ac.uk rmp@sanger.ac.uk cgb@sanger.ac.uk nw3@sanger.ac.uk jb1@sanger.ac.uk djt@sanger.ac.uk mdf@sanger.ac.uk cmc@sanger.ac.uk mjb@sanger.ac.uk ems@sanger.ac.uk lm4@sanger.ac.uk WEB_DIR_ROOT http://sflogin.internal.sanger.ac.uk:9000/
ELAND_MULTIPLE_INSTANCES 8
SEQUENCE_FORMAT --fastq QUALITY_FORMAT --symbolic
POST_RUN_COMMAND /nfs/team117/ts6/work/new-pipeline-dev/sanger-pipeline/branches/prerelease-7.0/bin/cleanup_run --verbose --nmake 4 --run 812 --lanes 1,2,3,5,6,7,8 > cleanup.out 2>&1
GENOME_DIR /software/solexa/Genomes/PhiX GENOME_FILE phi_plus_SNPs.fa
1235678:ANALYSIS sequence 4:ANALYSIS default
1235678:USE_BASES Y36 4:USE_BASES Y36
